Attention Loudoun non-profits—the county wants to hear about the needs you're seeing in our community as they prepare the next tranche of ARP grants.

Are you paying off student loans and think you might qualify for the Public Service Loan Forgiveness program?

#StandWithUkraine
https://t.co/FtH6XwXgIA

These acts of vile antisemitism have no place here.

I'm proud to stand with our Jewish community in Fairfax and across Virginia.

We will not tolerate this attempt to spread hate and division, and I appreciate law enforcement’s work to address this issue.
https://t.co/h1Q6uBj26m

#Beijing2022

Way to bring home the gold, Ashley! 🥇

Congratulations on making your Olympics dreams come true with this historic win for @TeamUSA—you've made Virginia proud.
https://t.co/pTnOd706LG

It's a no-brainer that elected officials shouldn't use their official position to enrich their own stock portfolios.

I'm proud to cosponsor the bipartisan TRUST in Congress Act to ban Members of Congress from actively trading stocks.

#Beijing2022

If you or a teen or parent you know would like to speak to a trained peer advocate, you can contact the National Dating Abuse Helpline at 1-866-331-9474, text “loveis” to 22522, or live chat at https://t.co/7NAO3KndOe.

Raising awareness about how to recognize dating violence and the resources that are out there to help teens is essential to support those who face this kind of abuse.

Thank you @RepBrianFitz, @RepAshleyHinson, and @RepDean for co-leading this bipartisan resolution with me.

Too many teens are struggling in unhealthy dating relationships and don't know where to turn for help.

I'm leading a bipartisan resolution today to designate February as "Teen Dating Violence Awareness and Prevention Month" to promote the importance of healthy relationships. https://t.co/scngHI4k0m

In many parts of the world, LGBTQ+ people are the targets of cruel, degrading, and often violent persecution.
 
With our passage of the #GlobalRespectAct today, we're holding those who commit these crimes accountable by barring their entry into the U.S. https://t.co/vwrpiwbEsg

This is a staggering loss for our country. My heart goes out to all Americans who have lost loved ones, friends, & neighbors.

Cancer is the #1 cause of disease-related death in kids ages 14 and younger—but there's a severe lack of funding for child-specific treatments and cures.

I'm fighting to pass my bipartisan #GMKF2 bill to deliver a major boost in funding for lifesaving research.

#WorldCancerDay

I just voted to pass the #AmericaCOMPETES Act to bolster U.S. manufacturing, shore up our supply chains, and supercharge semiconductor production.

These investments will make America more competitive abroad while supporting jobs and workers here at home.
https://t.co/nZOhUVy5vW

What's really going on while you watch the #Olympics?

#Beijing2022 is tainted by the PRC's human rights abuses and the IOC's complicity.

During the Games, I'll be sharing stories of disappeared activists, political prisoners, and other atrocities going on beyond the spectacle.

We’ve been hard at work today voting on a series of amendments to our #AmericaCOMPETES Act.

It’s a top priority bill that's going to reignite American manufacturing, research, development, & innovation—making us more competitive around the globe & supporting jobs here at home. https://t.co/h8y2Y3Uf1E

At the center of that history is the movement for justice and equality, which we all have a responsibility to carry on today.

Gun violence has devastated families and communities in Virginia and across the country.

Happy #LunarNewYear!

Women have lacked an explicit guarantee of our rights in the Constitution for far too long.

Two years ago, Virginia became the final state needed to ratify the Equal Rights Amendment. I'm cosponsoring a resolution affirming that the #ERA must be certified as our 28th Amendment. https://t.co/Y4E6FIdvId

We remember the dark history of the Holocaust so that we can ensure something like that will never happen again.

All of us have a responsibility to fight antisemitism here and around the world.

#HolocaustRemembranceDay

Our economy is on the right track to recovery. https://t.co/mxQlINHGzI

Federal funding is making it possible for our schools to renovate HVAC systems and keep kids healthy.

https://t.co/yLdjox8BcE

Today we mark one year since the bigoted transgender troop ban was revoked.

Trans members of our military are patriots, and we are forever grateful for their service to our country.

I was proud to stand against this ban and champion the rights & dignity of all trans Americans. https://t.co/x4uBbRRlfT

The Senate must act.
